title: Name calling ;)
body:
League should have a dictionary and a language

The latter being able to make quick requests or assessments when in the heat of the moment

Such as; Path clearing, (asking an ally with cc to separate a cluster of enemies from the way of their destination, say if you were running away from some other(s).)
Door-holding, (asking another ally to push minions to tower and keep them there as long as possible for you to make a secure getaway.)
Herding, (using damage and a strong presence to force an enemy (or enemies) into a clusterfck.)
Lock down, (force shut down of the enemies' momentum, like janna ult in middle of them allowing allies to take them on more favourably rather then getting steamrolled.)
Spear tackle, (Chargeing enemies with the likes of hecurim as your lead to quickly disable and finish one or more enemies. Try with 3 or more in an even fight, don't try it at all if you are losing bad)

That is all from my head, see if you can come up with some others and if you feel that this could be for the betterment of future games.
